languages.text: "Это вот как раз четвертый заместитель, который унаследовал должность после того, как начальник и первые три сгорели на работе", {n}— вполголоса, так, чтоб слышали только вы, замечает Абеляр.{/n} "Парень пока что неплохо справляется. Жароустойчивый, так сказать".

"The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."
languages.original_text: "Это вот как раз четвертый заместитель, который унаследовал должность после того, как начальник и первые три сгорели на работе", {n}— вполголоса, так, чтоб слышали только вы, замечает Абеляр.{/n} "Парень пока что неплохо справляется. Жароустойчивый, так сказать".

traits.locale_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

"The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

"The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

"The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

languages.text: “前任控火大师与三位副手都已经因公殉职，于是这个职位落在了他的头上。”{n}阿贝拉德以只有你能听得见的声音，对你耳语道。{/n}“到目前为止，这个小伙子都做得很好。可以说，他是能扛得住事的人。”
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: “前任火控大师与三位副手都已经因公殉职，于是这个职位落在了他的头上。”阿贝拉德以只有你能听得见的声音，对你耳语道。{/n}“到目前为止，这个小伙子都做得很好。可以说，他是能扛得住事的人。”

languages.text: 「前任のインフェルヌス・マスターと3人の副マスターが殉職した後、このポストは彼に引き継がれました。{n}アベラードは、あなたにだけ聞こえるように低い声で告げた。{/n}「今のところ、彼はうまくやっています。いわば、非難にも耐えられる人材ということです」
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: 「前任のインフェルヌス・マスターと3人の副マスターが殉職した後、このポストは彼に引き継がれました。{n}アベラードは、あなたにだけ聞こえるように低い声で告げた。{/n}「今のところ、彼はうまくやっています。いわば、非難にも耐えられる人材ということです」

languages.text: "Er hat den Posten erhalten, nachdem der vorherige Infernus-Meister und seine nächsten drei Vertreter in Ausübung ihrer Pflicht gefallen sind", {n}flüstert Abelard so leise, dass nur du es hören kannst.{/n} "Der Junge macht sich bisher recht gut. Er kommt sozusagen bestens damit zurecht, wenn's heiß wird."
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat den Posten erhalten, nachdem der vorherige Infernus-Meister und seine nächsten drei Vertreter in Ausübung ihrer Pflicht gefallen sind", flüstert Abelard so leise, dass nur du es hören kannst.{/n} "Der Junge macht sich bisher recht gut. Er kommt sozusagen bestens damit zurecht, wenn's heiß wird."

languages.text: « Le poste lui a été confié après la mort au feu du précédent maître-infernus et de ses trois premiers adjoints, {n}souligne Abélard à voix basse.{/n} Il se débrouille plutôt bien jusqu'à présent. Le garçon semble avoir les reins solides. »
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: « Le poste lui a été confié après la mort au feu du précédent maître-infernus et de ses trois premiers adjoints, {n}souligne Abélard à voix basse.{/n} Il se débrouille plutôt bien jusqu'à présent. Le garçon semble avoir les reins solides. »

languages.text: «Se hizo con el puesto cuando el anterior maestro de Infernus y sus tres delegados murieron en el desempeño de sus tareas», {n}comenta Abelard en voz tan baja que solo tú puedes oírla.{/n} «El muchacho lo está haciendo bien por ahora. Puede soportar la presión, por así decirlo».
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: «Se hizo con el puesto cuando el anterior maestro de Infernus y sus tres delegados murieron en el desempeño de sus tareas», comenta Abelard en voz tan baja que solo tú puedes oírla.{/n} «El muchacho lo está haciendo bien por ahora. Puede soportar la presión, por así decirlo».

languages.text: "Önceki İtfa Üstadı ve üç vekili vazife başında yittikten sonra görevi devraldı." {n}Abelard, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin kısık bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Delikanlı şimdiye kadar iyi idare ediyor. Tabiri caizse fişek gibi."
languages.original_text: "The post passed to him after the previous Infernus Master and his next three deputies expired in the line of duty," {n}Abelard remarks in a low voice pitched for your ears only.{/n} "The lad is managing well so far. He can take the heat, so to speak."

traits.locale_text: "Önceki İtfa Üstadı ve üç vekili vazife başında yittikten sonra görevi devraldı," {n}diyor Abelard, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin kısık bir sesle.{/n} "Delikanlı şimdiye kadar iyi idare ediyor. Tabiri caizse fişek gibi."
